abstract: Emily Cox and Henry Rathvon, we’ll just stay in the mighty jungle, where it’s safe.
lead_paragraph: ACROSTIC — I remark on this once in a while, and I’ll say it again: I really owe Team Cox/Rathvon a big thank you for providing reading recommendations. As smug and clever as I feel when I recognize a writer after solving (or, as proof of genius, once or twice recognizing an actual passage), it’s better for me and for all of us to discover new and interesting writers through solving these puzzles.
